description: The weather and light are always changing, and the Smith Squad goggles set you up for a crystal-clear view through it all. Their semi-rimless design and oversize cylindrical lens yield a wide field of view backed up by sharp optics and our best anti-fog tech. ChromaPop™ lens options heighten contrast and color so every wind lip and terrain feature comes through loud and clear.
name: Squad, White Vapor Goggles, ChromaPop Everyday Violet Mirror Lens / Clear Extra Lens

specs.value: ChromaPop™ enhances contrast and natural color to make the details pop
